sentence.Network_en: We took a plane south-west across the Anatolian plateau to Cappadocia.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们乘飞机向着西南方向越过安纳托利亚高原，前往卡帕多西亚。

sentence.Network_en: In the heart of the Anatolian steppe, dervishes still whirl on festive occasions in mystic union with God.
sentence.Network_cn: 在安纳托利亚大草原的深处，与真主神秘会合的庆祝场合，仍然会有托钵僧旋转起舞的身影。

sentence.Network_en: In general, the poem reflects the culture of the Anatolian landowning aristocracy.
sentence.Network_cn: 一般来说, 诗歌反映了安纳托利亚地区土地贵族的文化.
